sense.def:
Kdor je
strong
, ima v mišicah veliko moč.

seg.quote: His strong arms were around me, pinning me down.

sense.def:
Kdor je
strong
, je tudi zelo samozavesten in ne dovoli, da bi nanj vplivala mnenja ali stališča drugih.

seg.quote: I felt very strong in the knowledge of my own innocence.
...a strong personality.

sense.def:
Kar je
strong
, se ne razbije ali polomi tako hitro.

seg.quote: ...steel cylinders strong enough to survive even a nuclear catastrophe.
...strongly constructed buildings.

sense.def:
Izraz
strong
uporabljamo tudi za opis stvari, ki obstajajo v velikem obsegu ali so zelo silovite.

seg.quote: The strong possibility is that he will be told tomorrow.
...the strong wind.
They still spoke with a strong German accent.
His mother will strongly influence his choice of a wife.

sense.def:
To have strong views on something
ali
to express one's views using strong words
pomeni imeti zelo odločna stališča o nečem ali jih izraziti zelo odločno.

seg.quote: There is strong criticism of certain aspects of the case.
He has condemned the present sit-in by students in strong terms.
I feel very strongly about drugs.
I would strongly advise you against such an action.

sense.def:
Dejanje, ki je
strong
, je nepopustljivo in ostro.

seg.quote: They introduced a strong anti-inflation programme.

sense.def:
Kadar so stališča v prid nečesa
strong
, jih podpira veliko dokazov.

seg.quote: There is a strong case for an Act of Parliament.

sense.def:
Skupina, ki je
strong
, je velika ali ima velik vpliv.

seg.quote: It was essential to build a strong organization.

sense.def:
Besedo
strong
uporabimo tudi, da povemo, koliko ljudi je v skupini. Na primer,
a group that is twenty strong
je skupina, v kateri je dvajset ljudi.

One's strong points
so stvari, ki jih nekdo temeljito obvlada.

seg.quote: Maths was always his strong subject.

sense.def:
Tekmovalec ali kandidat, ki je
strong
, ima velike možnosti, da mu uspe.

Odnos, ki je
strong
, je trden in bo verjetno trajal še dolgo.

seg.quote: Links with the trade unions were strong.

sense.def:
Industrijske panoge, gospodarstva ali valute, ki so
strong
, so finančno uspešne.

seg.quote: Sterling has once again become one of the stronger currencies.

sense.def:
Kadar so pijače, kemične snovi ali zdravila
strong
, je v njih veliko določene snovi.

seg.quote: She made him a cup of tea so strong that he could not drink it.
...a strong household bleach.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
is still going strong
, je po dolgem času še uspešen in poln moči; kadar nekaj
is still going strong
, po dolgem času še vedno dobro deluje.

cit.quote: biti pri močeh; biti dobro ohranjen
